description.message: Get real time stock market information about your favorite stocks.

donatepromotext.description: If you can make a donation of any amount, I'd appreciate it immensely!

extrascrollamount.message: Quanto maior o valor, quanto mais rápido ele moverá.
extrascrollamount.description: How higher the value, how faster it will move.

desjapan.message: Altere a cor dos utilizadores da Ásia.

desxminutes.message: Update the stock market information on the choosen seconds

destitelfavo.message: Mostre à esquerda 4 gráficos favoritos das ações na barra.
destitelfavo.description: Show left the 4 favorite stock graph's in the bar.

deshoverpopup.message: Mostre a imagem de pop-up para o estoque atual, quando eu passar o mouse sobre o valor atual.
deshoverpopup.description: Show the popup image for that current stock, when i hover over the current value.

desfinancetoolbar.message: Your personal stocks toolbar on your desktop is also available for your computer.
desfinancetoolbar.description: our personal stocks toolbar on your desktop is also available for your computer.

titeldownloadaaupgrade.message: The upgrade adds support for focusing selected images, and will display a gallery of images on the site.
titeldownloadaaupgrade.description: The upgrade adds support for focusing selected images, and will display a gallery of images on the site.

titeldownloadupgradepropermenubar.message: Add back the black menubar on the Google website.

titeldownloadupgradefinancetoolbar.message: This shows you the real time stock market information.
titeldownloadupgradefinancetoolbar.description: This shows you the real time stock market information.

titeldownloadupgradefullscreen.message: With this extension you can easy go to full screen. This for image, video and webpage.
titeldownloadupgradefullscreen.description: With this extension you can easy go to full screen. This for image, video and webpage.

titeldownloadupgradezoom.message: Zoom in or out on web content using the zoom button for more comfortable reading.
titeldownloadupgradezoom.description: Zoom in or out on web content using the zoom button for more comfortable reading.

titeldownloadupgradedatetoday.message: This extension show the analog clock in the menu bar. When you click on the icon, it shows you the current time; month and day of the week.
titeldownloadupgradedatetoday.description: This extension show the analog clock in the menu bar. When you click on the icon, it shows you the current time; month and day of the week.

desrememberpage.message: If this option is enabled, it will not show you the reminder page

longdonatetext.message: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!

titelsyncbrowser.message: Sync the extension settings with your other browser.

titeldownloadupgrade.message: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the video as if you were in the cinema.
